acf.title:
Magento Rest API Integration
Services
acf.new_store_service_title:
Letâ€™s talk about some vital features of
Magento API

service_list.title: Clients
service_list.details: Options to create, delete and update customer information along with the list fetching functionality of customers

service_list.title: Catalogue
service_list.details: To fetch the list of stock account and to upload the stock via list.

service_list.title: Products
service_list.details: Create, update and delete information about products.

service_list.title: Categories Of Products
service_list.details: Get the list of categories assigned to your products, and you can also unassigned them as per your requirement.

service_list.title: Order For Sales
service_list.details: List of sales order along with specific order information

service_list.title: Order Items, Comments And Address
service_list.details: You can fetch the order items for a specified order and the address. You can also get the billing order along with shipment details. Comments for the specified order can also be obtained with the help of the list.

acf.tag_line: Magento Rest API is a part of Magento Enterprise and Community edition which helps to integrate business applications and make them reliable and secure. Mage Monkeys can undertake Magento REST API Integration with your business seamlessly and get you the desired results. With the help of REST and SOAP API the interaction between the business applications becomes easier and secure. The experts at Mage Monkeys have the experience of XML-RC, SOAP, or REST.
